QuestData.Title: Message for Matyas
QuestData.Description:
Alright. Everything is prepared. When you are ready, ask Courier Araak to summon Taskmaster Matyas as though you have just arrived.
I am sure a gift of a favorite drink will tempt him and the poison we've concocted will incapacitate him long enough to take my sinstone from him.
Our plan will work flawlessly!
QuestData.LogDescription: Summon Taskmaster Matyas back to camp.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Taskmaster Matyas at Feeders' Thicket.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, the Maw Walker! I have heard so much about you.
